item.title: My First Post
item.description: Welcone to my blog I’m hoping to start posting project logs here. The focus here will be: Programming/Web dev Woodworking Game development Occasionally embedded/firmware type stuff Maybe even baking? It’s hard to say exactly what will be here. Additionally, I’ll be posting links to any articles I write for Hackaday and Medium.
